structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The district is authorized to defray the cost of acquiring any real or personal property for the purposes contemplated by KRS 107.310 to 107.500 through the issuance of revenue bonds, and for that purpose the district shall have all the powers and duties that are granted to or imposed upon governmental units by law, including specifically the terms and provisions of KRS 58.010 to 58.140.
